name: Guide to Ikigai
description:
At ikigai's core concept, your purpose doesn't need to be work-related, economic status, or tied to your career. It doesn't have to be grand or a huge ambition. Instead, it's more about the process and immersion than the final destination.


This file includes:

  • A short written guide to Ikigai
  • Templates
  • DIY your own Ikigai
  • Reflection questions
  • Research/References
  • Example(s)


Remix the file to share your Ikigai!
